Title: Authorizes boards of trustees and boards of education to establish a tax stabilization reserve fund
Summary: Authorizes boards of trustees and boards of education to establish a tax stabilization reserve fund from monies identified as excess or surplus and allows such funds to be appropriated to stabilize the property tax rate.
LawCode: Add Art 44 ยง2150, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to authorizing establishment of tax stabilization reserve funds
